INSIGHTS.TITLE: Insights and Recommendations
INSIGHTS.ALL_GOOD: Everything is working well! Keep it up.
INSIGHTS.ADHERENCE_EXCELLENT_MESSAGE: You have {{rate}}% adherence. Keep up the great work!
INSIGHTS.ADHERENCE_GOOD_MESSAGE: Your adherence is at {{rate}}%. Good job!
INSIGHTS.ADHERENCE_MODERATE_MESSAGE: Your adherence is at {{rate}}%. You can improve!
INSIGHTS.ADHERENCE_POOR_MESSAGE: Your adherence is only {{rate}}%. It's important to improve for treatment success.
INSIGHTS.MISSED_DOSES_HIGH_MESSAGE: You missed {{count}} doses this week. Set up reminders to help.
INSIGHTS.TIME_PATTERN_POOR_MESSAGE: You have difficulty taking medications during {{timeSlot}} ({{rate}}% adherence). Consider adjusting times.
INSIGHTS.WEEKEND_PATTERN_POOR_MESSAGE: Your adherence drops on weekends ({{weekdayRate}}% weekdays vs {{weekendRate}}% weekends). Set special alarms.
INSIGHTS.STOCK_CRITICAL_MESSAGE: {{count}} medication(s) with critical stock. Check and restock urgently.
INSIGHTS.STOCK_LOW_MESSAGE: {{count}} medication(s) with low stock. Plan restocking.
INSIGHTS.MEDICATION_IMPROVEMENT_MESSAGE: Your adherence improved by {{improvement}}% last week. Congratulations!
INSIGHTS.STREAK_ACHIEVEMENT_MESSAGE: You achieved 100% adherence this week! Excellent!
INSIGHTS.ADHERENCE_IMPROVING_DESC: Your adherence is improving. Keep it up!
INSIGHTS.ADHERENCE_DECLINING_DESC: Your adherence has decreased in recent weeks. Let's recover?
INSIGHTS.EXCELLENT_ADHERENCE_DESC: You're maintaining over 90% adherence. Excellent work!
INSIGHTS.LOW_ADHERENCE_DESC: Your adherence is below 60%. Set up reminders to help.
INSIGHTS.FORGET_PATTERN_DESC: You tend to forget doses at a specific time.
INSIGHTS.WEEKEND_PATTERN_DESC: You forget more doses on weekends.
INSIGHTS.LOW_STOCK_DESC: Some medications are running out soon.
INSIGHTS.CRITICAL_STOCK_DESC: Medications running out in the next few days. Restock urgently!
INSIGHTS.SCHEDULE_ADJUSTMENT_DESC: You frequently delay doses. How about adjusting the time?
INSIGHTS.PROBLEMATIC_MED_DESC: This medication has a high forgetting rate.

REPORTS.TITLE: Reports and Insights
REPORTS.NOTES_PLACEHOLDER: Add notes or context for the report...
REPORTS.DOWNLOAD_ERROR: Error generating report. Please try again.

OFFLINE.SYNC_FAILED: Failed to sync. Please try again.
OFFLINE.CONFLICT_DESCRIPTION: The data on your device and on the server are different. Please choose which version to keep.
OFFLINE.KEEP_SERVER_DESC: Discard your local changes and use server data.
OFFLINE.KEEP_LOCAL_DESC: Upload your changes to the server, replacing remote data.
OFFLINE.MERGE_DESC: Combine local and server data, keeping the most recent changes from each field.

TOAST.OFFLINE: You are offline. Changes will sync when you're back online.

HERO.TITLE: Choose the perfect plan for you
HERO.SUBTITLE: Manage medications with intelligence and security.

COMPARISON.TITLE: Complete Feature Comparison
COMPARISON.SUBTITLE: See in detail what each plan offers

FAQ.TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.Q1_ANSWER: Yes! You can cancel your subscription at any time with no penalties or additional fees.
FAQ.Q2_ANSWER: We accept credit cards (via Stripe) and also PIX, boleto, and cards through PagSeguro.
FAQ.Q3_TITLE: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
FAQ.Q3_ANSWER: Yes! You can change your plan at any time. The price adjustment will be made proportionally.
FAQ.Q4_TITLE: Is there a free trial period?
FAQ.Q4_ANSWER: The free plan is always available. For paid plans, we offer a 7-day guarantee.
FAQ.Q5_ANSWER: Yes! We don't store credit card data. All payments are processed by Stripe and PagSeguro, PCI-DSS certified platforms.

CTA.TITLE: Ready to get started?
CTA.SUBTITLE: Choose the plan that best fits your needs

SOCIAL_PROOF.TESTIMONIAL_2_TEXT: The AI insights helped me identify patterns that even my doctor hadn't noticed.
SOCIAL_PROOF.TESTIMONIAL_3_TEXT: I never forget to take my medications anymore. The reminders are perfect!

FAQ.TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.Q1_ANSWER: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade at any time.
FAQ.Q2_TITLE: Is the free trial really no commitment?
FAQ.Q2_ANSWER: Yes! Cancel before 7 days and you won't be charged anything.
FAQ.Q3_ANSWER: Absolutely! We use end-to-end encryption and LGPD compliance.
